ComicInfo.Summary:
Shop Around the Clock!: ALF figures out a way for Kate to take him Christmas shopping.
Snowman Is an Island!: ALF gives the Tanners the gift of a white Christmas.
The Return of Crazy Critter!: ALF reprises his role as Willie's high school mascot.
"The Gift of the Melmagi" (with Apologies to O. Henry): ALF tells the Tanners a Melmacian holiday story.
"Wotif the 12 Days of Christmas Happened on Melmac?": ALF uses his spaceship to show what the 12 days of Christmas would be like on Melmac.
23 Ski-Do's and Don'ts!: ALF has to ski off for help when the Tanners are trapped in a mountain cabin.
"ALF Lang-Syne": The Tanners throw a New Year's Eve party.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:37:22. [Issue ID 210223]
